title: Crunch CEO on Range of Emotions Over Virus
itunes:title: Crunch CEO on Range of Emotions Over Virus
description:
Jim Rowley, Chief Executive Officer of Crunch Fitness, discusses making "difficult" decisions to close gyms and lay off employees. Rowley also discusses how the pandemic has resulted in a loss of revenue. He explains how franchisees are unable to qualify for federal stimulus or insurance even as landlords continue to collect rent.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
